changes_made: src/mcp-server/index.ts (modified - added ACP imports and 3 new tools)
new_tools_added: bus_get_acp_protocol - Returns the complete Agent Coordination Protocol (ACP) v1.0 specification with all 10 message types, consensus protocol, task handoff automation, and example workflows
bus_request_consensus - Automates consensus voting by sending CONSENSUS_REQUEST messages and managing correlation IDs for vote collection. Returns request details for polling responses
bus_validate_acp_message - Validates message structure against ACP specification, checking for required fields, valid message types, and proper JSON structure
